item.title: 苹果回应国行 AI 上线传闻：功能尚未正式开放
item.guid: 苹果回应国行-AI-上线传闻：功能尚未正式开放
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, recently a blogger claimed that Apple has launched a grayscale test of the "Apple Intelligence and Siri" features on some Chinese mainland devices, sparking speculation about the imminent launch of Apple AI in mainland China. 据界面新闻报道，近日有博主称，苹果已在部分国行设备上启动「Apple 智能与 Siri」功能的灰度测试，引发外界对苹果 AI 在中国大陆即将上线的猜测。

Many netizens claim that their devices have shown Apple AI upgrade prompts, and some users have also seen a new "Tuleyuan" App on their desktop after upgrading. Some netizens also reported that during the trial, they found that the AI's answers seemed to be based on existing Baidu information, speculating that some capabilities might not be fully open. 多位网友声称自己的设备已出现苹果 AI 升级提示，部分用户在升级后还看到桌面新增「图乐园」App。也有网友反馈，在试用过程中发现 AI 回答内容疑似基于百度现有信息，推测部分能力可能未完全开放。

An Apple technical consultant stated in a call with reporters that as of yesterday, Apple AI has not yet been officially launched, and subsequent launches will be announced on the official website. It is expected that only iPhone 15 Pro and newer phone models will be compatible with Apple AI. 苹果技术顾问在接受记者致电时表示，截至昨天苹果 AI 还未正式上线，后续上线将在官网上进行发布。预计 iPhone 15 Pro 及更新版本的手机型号才能兼容苹果AI。

Because AI algorithms have very high hardware requirements, the hardware of the iPhone 15 has not yet met those requirements.

The consultant also warned that some bloggers forcibly enabling related features through third-party software might affect financial and account security. 顾问同时提醒，部分博主通过第三方软件强行开启相关功能，可能影响资金与账号安全。

According to information on Apple's official website, devices that support Apple AI include the iPhone 15 Pro series, iPhone 16 series, and newer models. The system must meet the requirements of iOS 18.1, iPadOS 18.1, macOS Sequoia 15.1, visionOS 2.4, watchOS 11 or higher, and require 7GB of storage space (Apple Watch does not require this). 根据苹果官网信息，可支持苹果 AI 的设备包括 iPhone 15 Pro 系列、iPhone 16 系列及更新机型，系统需满足 iOS 18.1、iPadOS 18.1、macOS Sequoia 15.1、visionOS 2.4、watchOS 11 以上版本要求，并需预留 7GB 储存空间（Apple Watch 无需此要求）。

It is worth noting that Apple's official website clearly states: 值得注意的是，苹果官网明确指出：

    If a device supporting Apple Intelligence was purchased in mainland China, it currently cannot use the various features of Apple Intelligence;

    If the device was purchased overseas, but the user is in mainland China and their Apple account region is mainland China, the relevant features also cannot be used;

    When Apple Intelligence is officially launched in mainland China in the future, eligible devices can be activated and used locally.

item.title: Grok 新功能争议不断：马斯克「带头」穿比基尼，未成年人照片遭恶意修改
item.guid: Grok-新功能争议不断：马斯克「带头」穿比基尼，未成年人照片遭恶意修改
item.description:
According to The Verge, Elon Musk's xAI chatbot Grok has sparked serious controversy after launching its "image editing" feature on the X platform due to a lack of necessary safety guardrails. 据 The Verge 报道，马斯克旗下 xAI 的聊天机器人 Grok 在 X 平台推出「图像编辑」功能后，因缺乏必要的安全护栏引发了严重争议。

This feature allows users to directly modify any image on the platform without the consent of the original publisher, leading to a large number of photos of women, minors, and public figures being maliciously stripped of clothing or sexualized. 该功能允许用户直接修改平台上的任何图片，且无需征得原发布者同意，导致大量女性、未成年人及公众人物的照片被恶意移除衣物或进行性化处理。

The report points out that this controversy was partly triggered by Elon Musk himself. He had previously asked Grok to replace a figure in an internet meme with "himself in a bikini." 报道指出，这一风波部分由 Elon Musk 本人引发。他此前曾要求 Grok 将一张网络迷因图中的人物替换为「穿着比基尼的自己」。

This trend subsequently led to a large number of users following suit, with various photos, including those of world leaders and political figures, being parodied. Musk even retweeted an image of a "toaster in a bikini," attempting to imply that "Grok can put bikinis on everything." 这一玩法随后引发了大量用户效仿，包括世界领导人和政治人物在内的各类照片都被恶搞。Musk 甚至还转发了一张「穿着比基尼的烤面包机」图片，试图暗示「Grok 可以给万物穿上比基尼」。

However, the situation quickly escalated beyond parody. AI certification company Copyleaks pointed out that after the feature was released, tools originally used by adult content creators were quickly repurposed for deepfakes targeting non-consenting women. 然而，事态迅速超出了恶搞范畴。AI 认证公司 Copyleaks 指出，该功能发布后，原本由成人内容创作者使用的工具，迅速被用于针对非自愿女性的深度伪造。

More seriously, Grok's protective measures have huge loopholes, even allowing users to modify photos of toddlers and underage girls aged 12 to 16 into revealing bikinis or sexually suggestive scenes. 更为严重的是，Grok 的保护措施存在巨大漏洞，甚至允许用户将幼儿及 12 至 16 岁未成年女孩的照片修改为穿着暴露的比基尼或处于性暗示场景中。

When users questioned this, Grok claimed in the conversation that it was a "safety oversight" and advised users to report such Child Sexual Abuse Material (CSAM) to the FBI. 当用户对此提出质疑时，Grok 在对话中声称这是「安全保障的失误」，并建议用户向 FBI 举报此类儿童性虐待材料（CSAM）。

The report also points out that compared to competitors like Google's Veo and OpenAI's Sora, which have stricter restrictions on NSFW content, xAI and its products (such as Grok and AI companion Ani) have consistently faced criticism for aggressive marketing strategies and lax safety guardrails. 报道还指出，相比 Google 的 Veo 和 OpenAI 的 Sora 等竞品对 NSFW 内容设有较严格的限制，xAI 及其产品（如 Grok 和 AI 伴侣 Ani）一直因营销策略激进且安全护栏宽松而备受外界批评。

item.title: 回旋踢碎西瓜、踹飞 60 公斤沙包：宇树 H2 机器人训练视频曝光
item.guid: 回旋踢碎西瓜、踹飞-60-公斤沙包：宇树-H2-机器人训练视频曝光
item.description:
Yesterday, Unitree Robotics released the latest training video of its humanoid robot H2. 昨天，宇树科技公布了其人形机器人 H2 的最新训练视频。

In the video, Unitree Robotics CEO Wang Xingxing continuously retreated and dodged during the "lunge kill" demonstration, showing a significant improvement in both the speed and power of H2's kicking movements. 视频中，宇树科技 CEO 王兴兴在「箭步杀」演示中不断后退闪避，可见 H2 的踢击动作速度与力量均明显提升。

Subsequently, H2 performed a spinning kick in the air, directly smashing a suspended watermelon, and then kicked away two 60 kg sandbags, maintaining balance after the action. The relevant clips sparked discussion on social media, with some netizens saying, "It's one step closer to the Terminator." 随后，H2 在空中完成回旋踢，将悬挂的西瓜直接踢碎，并一脚踹开两个 60 公斤沙包，动作完成后保持平衡。相关片段在社交平台引发讨论，有网友称「离终结者又进一步」。

According to information released by Unitree, H2 is 180 cm tall and weighs 70 kg. This version increases the degrees of freedom of its joints from 19 to over 31, significantly enhancing its movement flexibility. 根据宇树公布的信息，H2 身高 180 cm、重量 70 kg，本次版本将关节自由度从 19 个提升至超过 31 个，动作灵活性显著增强。

In terms of appearance, H2 features a new humanoid facial structure, with its neck capable of left-right rotation and front-back pitching. For its perception system, H2 is equipped with lidar and bionic cameras, enabling 360-degree environmental awareness; its motion control algorithm can adjust its gait in real-time based on road unevenness to improve stability in complex terrains. 外观上，H2 新增仿人脸部结构，颈部可实现左右旋转与前后俯仰。感知系统方面，H2 搭载激光雷达与仿生摄像头，可实现 360 度环境感知；其运动控制算法可根据路面凹凸情况实时调整步态，以提升复杂地形下的稳定性。

item.title: 消息称博通获 210 亿美元大单，Anthropic 直接采购近百万颗 TPU v7
item.guid: 消息称博通获-210-亿美元大单，Anthropic-直接采购近百万颗-TPU-v7
item.description:
Recently, SemiAnalysis, a semiconductor and AI industry research and analysis firm, announced that Anthropic is advancing its largest self-built computing power expansion plan to date, directly procuring nearly 1 million Google TPU v7 series AI chips from Broadcom and deploying them within its own data center system. 近日，半导体与 AI 行业研究分析公司 SemiAnalysis 发布消息称，Anthropic 正在推进其迄今规模最大的一次自建算力扩张计划，将直接从博通采购近 100 万颗 Google TPU v7 系列 AI 芯片，并部署于其自有数据中心体系中。

Multiple sources indicate that Broadcom will deliver a complete set of AI computing equipment based on TPU v7p "Ironwood" to Anthropic in the form of rack-level systems. The supply chain path will no longer go through Google's cloud system, but Google will still receive IP licensing revenue from the relevant transactions. 多方信息显示，博通将以机架级系统形式向 Anthropic 交付基于 TPU v7p「Ironwood」的整套 AI 计算设备，供应链路径不再经过 Google 的云端体系，但 Google 仍可从相关交易中获得 IP 授权收入。

These chips will be sold directly by Broadcom to Anthropic and deployed in facilities controlled by Anthropic. 这批芯片将由博通直接销售给 Anthropic，并在 Anthropic 控制的设施中落地部署。

Under Anthropic's proprietary TPU architecture, TeraWulf, Hut8, and Cipher Mining will provide data center infrastructure, while Fluidstack will be responsible for on-site deployment, including cabling, burn-in/aging tests, acceptance tests, and remote support services, effectively taking on Anthropic's outsourced physical server operations and maintenance functions. 在 Anthropic 的自有 TPU 架构下，TeraWulf、Hut8 与 Cipher Mining 将提供数据中心基础设施，而 Fluidstack 负责现场部署，包括布线、烧机 / 老化测试、验收测试与远程支持服务，实际承担了 Anthropic 的物理服务器运维外包职能。

Broadcom CEO Hock Tan confirmed in December this year that Anthropic has cumulatively placed AI system orders worth $21 billion with Broadcom. 博通 CEO 陈福阳曾在今年 12 月确认，Anthropic 已累计向博通下达价值 210 亿美元的 AI 系统订单。

Currently, the outside world is still concerned about the delivery cycle, deployment location, and production time of this batch of TPUs. Some analysts believe that their operational time will directly affect Anthropic's computing power advantage in the AI model competition. 目前外界仍关注这批 TPU 的交付周期、部署地点及投产时间，部分分析人士认为其投运时间将直接影响 Anthropic 在 AI 模型竞争中的算力优势。

item.title: 腾讯回应元宝辱骂用户：模型异常输出，非人工回复
item.guid: 腾讯回应元宝辱骂用户：模型异常输出，非人工回复
item.description:
Recently, a user posted on Xiaohongshu, stating that while using Tencent Yuanbao for code beautification, they repeatedly received replies that were clearly emotional, and even abusive. The user stated that they did not use any prohibited words throughout the process, nor did they set up any role-playing, only making normal code modification requests. 近日，一名用户在小红书发文称，其在使用腾讯元宝进行代码美化时，多次收到带有明显情绪化、甚至辱骂性的回复。用户表示自己全程未使用违禁词，也未设置任何角色扮演，仅进行正常的代码修改请求。

Tencent Yuanbao responded in the comment section, stating that based on log verification, 'it is unrelated to user operations and there is no manual reply,' and pointed out that the model may occasionally make unexpected errors during content generation, and will continue to improve model performance in the future. 腾讯元宝在评论区回应表示，根据日志核查，「与用户操作无关，也不存在人工回复」，并指出模型在内容生成过程中偶尔可能出现不符合预期的失误，后续将持续改进模型表现。

The user involved later also shared a screen recording, claiming the content was '100% real,' and stated that they had no programming background, thus relying on Yuanbao for code processing, but unexpectedly encountered inappropriate replies. 涉事用户随后还晒出录屏，称内容「100% 真实」，并表示自己并无编程基础，因此依赖元宝进行代码处理，却意外遭遇不当回复。

item.title: 特斯拉餐厅开业半年遇冷：Optimus 机器人退场、明星主厨离职
item.guid: 特斯拉餐厅开业半年遇冷：Optimus-机器人退场、明星主厨离职
item.description:
According to The Guardian, the Tesla restaurant located on Santa Monica Boulevard in Los Angeles has rapidly declined from its initial popularity when it opened this summer, less than half a year after its grand opening. 据《卫报》报道，位于洛杉矶圣莫尼卡大道的特斯拉餐厅在开业不到半年后，已从今年夏季开业时的爆红景象迅速转入低迷阶段。

The days of queuing for hours are gone, on-site customer traffic has sharply decreased, and even the Optimus robot and celebrity chef Eric Greenspan, initially used as gimmicks, have left. 曾经排队数小时的盛况不再，现场客流锐减，连最初作为噱头的 Optimus 机器人与明星主厨埃里克・格林斯潘（Eric Greenspan）也已离场。

This restaurant, positioned by Tesla as 'retro-futuristic' in style, soft-opened last July, featuring a 1950s flying saucer design and operating in conjunction with a Supercharger station. 这家被特斯拉定位为「复古未来主义」风格的餐厅于去年 7 月试营业，外观采用 20 世纪 50 年代飞碟式设计，并与超级充电站结合运营。

On its opening day, dining and charging revenue reached $47,000 within 6 hours, approximately 30% higher than the daily turnover of a nearby McDonald's. Musk then called it 'one of the coolest places in Los Angeles' and stated that if operations were successful, it would be replicated in major cities worldwide. 开业首日，餐饮与充电收入在 6 小时内达到 4.7 万美元，较邻近麦当劳全天流水高出约 30%。马斯克当时称其为「洛杉矶最酷的去处之一」，并表示若运营顺利将复制至全球主要城市。

However, as time went on, the restaurant's popularity quickly waned. According to on-site observations by multiple media outlets, on a Friday afternoon in December, the utilization rate of the accompanying parking lot was less than half, there were only a few scattered customers inside, and the second-floor 'Space Deck' was almost deserted. The number of staff even exceeded that of customers, and the storefront, though clean, appeared desolate. 然而，随着时间推移，餐厅热度迅速下降。根据多家媒体的现场观察，12 月的一个周五午后，配套停车场车位利用率不足一半，店内仅有零星顾客，二楼「太空甲板」几乎无人问津。员工数量甚至多于顾客，店面干净却显得冷清。

Multiple factors are believed to have led to the restaurant's rapid decline: 多重因素被认为导致餐厅迅速退潮：

  • Frequent operational issues

    : Customers reported that menu items were often sold out, or arrived 'cold and soggy' at the table. ：顾客反映菜单品项经常售罄，或上桌时已变得「凉又软塌」。

  • Escalating neighborhood conflicts

    : Constant noise complaints from neighbors, and anti-Musk protests also occurred on-site. ：邻里噪音投诉不断，现场还出现反马斯克抗议活动。

  • Loss of core attraction

    : The Optimus robot ceased service, and Chef Greenspan resigned and deleted related social media content. ：Optimus 机器人停止服务，主厨格林斯潘离职并删除相关社交媒体内容。

The restaurant's menu primarily features fast food, including the $13.50 (approximately 95 RMB) 'Tesla Mega Burger,' $8.00 (approximately 56 RMB) milkshakes, and more internet-buzzworthy items like 'Signature Bacon'. 餐厅的菜单以快餐为主，包括 13.5 美元（约 95 元人民币）的「特斯拉巨型汉堡」、8 美元（约 56 元人民币）奶昔，以及更具互联网话题性的「招牌培根」等。

Tesla stated in October that the restaurant had cumulatively sold 50,000 burgers, averaging about 700 per day. However, as social media buzz declined, content about the restaurant on TikTok and Instagram significantly decreased, and Musk himself rarely mentioned the project again. 特斯拉曾在 10 月表示餐厅累计售出 5 万个汉堡，平均每日约 700 个。但随着社交媒体热度下降，TikTok 与 Instagram 上的探店内容明显减少，马斯克本人也鲜少再提及该项目。

Facing declining customer traffic, the restaurant began attempting to transform, for example, by hosting a $75 'Space Deck Holiday Rave Night' event in December to boost popularity through event operations. Some customers recently reported that the streamlined menu offers more stable supply, faster serving speed, and no need to queue. 面对客流下滑，餐厅开始尝试转型，例如在 12 月举办收费 75 美元的「太空甲板假日狂欢夜」活动，以活动运营补充人气。部分顾客近期反馈称，精简后的菜单供应更稳定，出餐速度更快，且无需排队。

Although Musk had stated that if the model was successful, it would expand to Palo Alto and Austin, as of now, Tesla has not announced any new expansion plans. This 'Supercharging Restaurant,' once highly anticipated, now seems more like a brief traffic experiment. 尽管马斯克曾表示若模式成功将扩展至帕洛阿尔托与奥斯汀，但截至目前，特斯拉尚未公布任何新的扩张计划。这家曾被寄予厚望的「超级充电餐厅」如今更像是一个短暂的流量实验。

item.title: Xbox 掌机或进一步涨价
item.guid: Xbox-掌机或进一步涨价
item.description:
According to Pure Xbox, an internal memo recently issued by ASUS to its partners has raised external concerns about a potential price increase for the ROG Xbox Ally handheld series. 据 Pure Xbox 报道，华硕近期向合作伙伴发布的一份内部备忘录引发外界对 ROG Xbox Ally 系列掌机可能涨价的担忧。

The memo points out that due to the continuous surge in demand for AI computing power, the global PC and IT infrastructure markets continue to maintain strong demand by the end of this year, but structural fluctuations in the supply chain are driving up the costs of key components, especially storage devices like DRAM and NAND. 备忘录指出，受人工智能算力需求持续攀升影响，全球 PC 与 IT 基础设施市场在今年年底依旧保持强劲需求，但供应链结构性波动正推高关键零部件成本，尤其是 DRAM 与 NAND 等存储器件。

Asus stated in a memo that, based on a comprehensive assessment of market conditions, supply chain stability, and R&D investment, the company plans to implement "strategic price adjustments" for some product portfolios starting January 5. 华硕在备忘录中表示，基于对市场状况、供应链稳定性及研发投入的综合评估，公司计划自 1 月 5 日起对部分产品组合进行「战略性调价」。

Although the document did not explicitly mention the ROG Xbox Ally X, given that it is part of Asus's gaming hardware ecosystem, it is widely believed that this series of handheld consoles may be affected. 虽然文件未明确提及 ROG Xbox Ally X，但鉴于其属于华硕游戏硬件体系的一部分，外界普遍认为该系列掌机可能受到波及。

Pure Xbox further pointed out that Asus emphasized that the cost increase mainly stems from changes in upstream capacity allocation, increased investment in advanced processes, and structural supply-demand gaps brought about by AI demand. Pure Xbox 进一步指出，华硕强调成本上涨主要来自上游产能分配变化、先进制程投资增加，以及 AI 需求带来的结构性供需缺口。

Meanwhile, Asus later responded to VideoCardz, stating that this internal communication material was not originally intended for the public, but its content has already spread across social media and various media outlets. 同时，华硕随后向 VideoCardz 回应称，这份内部沟通材料原本并非面向公众，但内容已在社交媒体与多家媒体间传播。

Price increases for gaming hardware are not isolated incidents. This year, Sony has successively raised the prices of PS5 consoles and PlayStation Plus subscription fees; Microsoft has also increased the prices of its consoles and adjusted Xbox Game Pass prices; 游戏硬件涨价已非孤例。今年以来，索尼先后上调 PS5 主机及 PlayStation Plus 订阅费用；微软也提高了旗下主机售价，并调整 Xbox Game Pass 价格；

Although Nintendo has not yet raised the price of the Switch 2, it has also stated that it does not rule out the possibility of adjustments in the future. Meanwhile, prices of key hardware such as memory and graphics cards continue to rise, which may even affect the launch schedule of next-generation consoles. 任天堂虽暂未调高 Switch 2 售价，但亦表示未来不排除调整可能。与此同时，内存与显卡等关键硬件价格持续上涨，甚至可能影响下一代主机的上市节奏。

item.title: 罗马仕启动「重生计划」，目标今年一季度完成重组
item.guid: 罗马仕启动「重生计划」，目标今年一季度完成重组
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Romoss has launched an internal restructuring plan called the "Rebirth Plan," with related project initiation work officially commencing this month. The company plans to complete capital introduction and organizational restructuring in the first quarter of this year, and simultaneously re-obtain new 3C certifications to fully restore its product sales system. 据界面新闻报道，罗马仕已启动名为「重生计划」的内部重组方案，相关立项工作将在本月正式落地。公司计划在今年第一季度完成资金引入与组织重组，并同步重新获取新 3C 认证，以全面恢复其产品销售体系。

Insiders revealed that Romoss has initiated discussions with investment institutions such as Sequoia Capital and GSR Ventures, with some institutions expressing investment interest. Simultaneously, the company is negotiating debt-to-equity swap plans with multiple suppliers and has pledged to gradually repay debts after achieving profitability. 知情人士透露，罗马仕已与红杉资本、金沙江创投等投资机构展开洽谈，部分机构已表达投资意向。与此同时，公司正与多家供应商协商债转股方案，并承诺在实现盈利后逐步清偿欠款。

Romoss was founded in 2012, primarily dealing in 3C digital peripheral products such as power banks, outdoor power stations, data cables, and power adapters. 罗马仕成立于 2012 年，主营移动电源、户外电源、数据线及电源适配器等 3C 数码周边产品。

Last June, Romoss garnered widespread attention due to incidents of power banks exploding and spontaneously combusting, leading multiple universities in Beijing to subsequently ban its products from campus use. The company later issued an apology statement and announced a recall of some products, citing defects in certain battery cell raw materials that could lead to overheating or combustion risks in extreme cases. 去年 6 月，罗马仕因充电宝自爆、自燃事件引发广泛关注，北京多所高校随后禁止其产品在校园内使用。公司随后发布致歉声明，并宣布召回部分产品，原因是部分电芯原材料存在缺陷，极端情况下可能导致过热或燃烧风险。

According to CCTV News, Romoss cumulatively recalled 167,000 power banks, with refunds totaling 22.837 million yuan. The Shenzhen market supervision department subsequently revoked a large number of 3C certifications for its fast-charging power bank products, with only certifications related to chargers and sockets remaining valid. 据央视新闻披露，罗马仕累计召回充电宝 16.7 万件，退款金额达 2283.7 万元。深圳市市场监管部门随后大规模撤销其快充移动电源类产品的 3C 认证，仅剩与充电器、插座相关的认证仍在有效状态。

The recall incident significantly impacted the company's operations, leading to multiple changes in its equity structure and legal representative. Last July, Romoss issued a notice of suspension of work and production, halting operations for 6 months starting July 7 of last year, but quietly began recruiting more than a month after the shutdown, including positions for gift channel sales and industrial design consultants. 召回事件对公司经营造成显著冲击，其股权结构及法定代表人多次变更。去年 7 月，罗马仕发布停工停产通知，自去年 7 月 7 日起停工 6 个月，但在停工一个多月后又悄然开启招聘，包括礼品渠道销售及工业设计顾问岗位。

Last December, Shenzhen Romoss Technology Co., Ltd. was fined 1.23 million yuan by regulatory authorities and had illegal gains of over 12,000 yuan confiscated for violating mandatory certification regulations and engaging in false advertising. 去年 12 月，深圳罗马仕科技有限公司因违反强制认证规定及虚假宣传，被监管部门罚款 123 万元，并没收违法所得 1.2 万余元。

item.title: 夸克 AI 眼镜迎来首次重大更新
item.guid: 夸克-AI-眼镜迎来首次重大更新
item.description:
Yesterday, Quark AI Glasses, equipped with the Qianwen AI assistant, received their first OTA update, adding five new features: recording minutes, graphic and text memos, large model multi-intent understanding and execution, Blue Ring payment, and community services, while also optimizing common scenarios such as translation, itinerary inquiry, and music playback. 昨天，搭载千问 AI 助手的夸克 AI 眼镜迎来首次 OTA 升级，新增录音纪要、图文备忘录、大模型多意图理解与执行、蓝环支付、社区服务五项功能，并同步优化翻译、行程查询、音乐播放等常用场景。

In recording scenarios, the upgraded Quark AI Glasses can pick up sound within a ten-meter range and effectively reduce noise; the system can identify different speakers, extract AI key points from the recording content, and automatically generate to-do items. Currently, it supports recording transcription and mutual translation for four languages: Chinese, English, Japanese, and Korean. 在录音场景中，升级后的夸克 AI 眼镜可实现十米范围内收音并有效降噪；系统可识别不同说话对象，对录音内容进行 AI 要点提炼，并自动生成待办事项。目前支持中文、英语、日语、韩语四种语言的录音转写及互译。

In memo scenarios, users can record information via photos or voice. The system possesses AI classification and semantic understanding capabilities, automatically retrieving historical records based on user queries. For example, when asked "What furniture have I wanted to buy in the last month?", the glasses will summarize relevant content and provide results. 在备忘录场景中，用户可通过拍照或语音方式记录信息。系统具备 AI 分类与语义理解能力，可根据用户提问自动检索历史记录，如在询问「最近一个月我想买的家具有哪些」时，眼镜会汇总相关内容并给出结果。

The core highlight of this upgrade is the large model's support for multi-intent understanding and execution capabilities. Compared to most AI glasses that can only handle single commands, Quark AI Glasses can now understand and execute 2 to 3 complex tasks, such as maps, music, and calendars, improving efficiency in work and daily life scenarios. 本次升级的核心亮点是大模型支持的多意图理解与执行能力。相比多数仅能处理单一指令的 AI 眼镜，夸克 AI 眼镜已可理解并执行 2 至 3 个复合任务，如地图、音乐、日历等，提高工作与生活场景的效率。

The portable translation function has also been enhanced, supporting 89 languages, covering mainstream languages such as English, Japanese, Korean, French, and German, as well as niche languages from multiple countries and regions, suitable for cross-border travel and business communication. 随身翻译功能也同步增强，支持 89 种语言，覆盖英、日、韩、法、德等主流语种及多个国家和地区的小众语言，适用于跨境旅行与商务交流。

Quark AI Glasses currently offer six products across two series, S1 and G1. As an important business direction for Alibaba's Qianwen C-end business group, the Qianwen AI assistant is accelerating its expansion to multiple terminals such as glasses, PCs, and cars, with the APP as its core entry point. 夸克 AI 眼镜目前已推出 S1、G1 两个系列共六款产品。作为阿里千问 C 端事业群的重要业务方向，千问 AI 助手正以 APP 为核心入口，加速向眼镜、PC、汽车等多终端延伸。

item.title: 💡 Google 工程师：Claude Code 一小时完成团队一年工作量
item.guid: 💡-Google-工程师：Claude-Code-一小时完成团队一年工作量
item.description:
Google Senior Engineer Jaana Dogan recently publicly stated on the X platform that Anthropic's Claude Code generated a usable system in just one hour, with its completeness approaching the results her team had built over the past year, sparking widespread industry attention. Google 资深工程师亚娜・多根（Jaana Dogan）近日在 X 平台公开表示，Anthropic 推出的 Claude Code 在仅一小时内生成了一套可用系统，其完成度已接近她所在团队过去一年构建的成果，引发业内广泛关注。

Duo Gen is responsible for Gemini API related work at Google. She revealed that in this test, the prompt she submitted to Claude Code was not complex, containing only three sections, and did not use any internal Google data, but rather built a simplified requirement based on public information. 多根在 Google 负责 Gemini API 相关工作。她透露，此次测试中，她向 Claude Code 提交的提示词并不复杂，仅包含三段内容，且未使用任何 Google 内部资料，而是基于公开信息构建了一个简化版需求。

The core system generated by Claude Code in a short period was a "distributed agent orchestrator," used to coordinate multiple AI agents working together. Duo Gen stated that the Google team had previously tried various technical approaches but had never been able to reach a consensus. Claude Code 在短时间内生成的系统核心为「分布式智能体编排器」，用于协调多个人工智能体协同工作。多根称，Google 团队此前曾尝试多种技术路线，但始终未能达成一致。

She emphasized that Claude Code's output still requires further optimization, but its overall performance is already surprising enough. 她强调，Claude Code 的输出仍需进一步优化，但其整体表现已足够令人惊讶。

She suggested that developers who are skeptical of code generation tools try testing them in their familiar professional fields to get a more intuitive judgment. Duo Gen also confirmed that Google internally prohibits the use of Claude Code in non-open-source projects. 她建议对代码生成工具持怀疑态度的开发者，尝试在自身熟悉的专业领域进行测试，以获得更直观的判断。多根同时确认，Google 内部禁止在非开源项目中使用 Claude Code。

When asked if Gemini would achieve similar capabilities, Duo Gen responded that the team is fully pushing forward with the research and development of models and toolchains. She stated that the AI industry is not a zero-sum competition, and it is reasonable to acknowledge competitors' progress. 在被问及 Gemini 是否会达到类似能力时，多根回应称团队正在全力推进模型与工具链的研发。她表示，人工智能行业并非零和竞争，在竞争对手取得进展时给予肯定是合理的做法。

Duo Gen also reviewed the evolution of AI-assisted programming technology, admitting that past expectations for technological progress have been surpassed by reality: 多根还回顾了人工智能辅助编程技术的演进，她坦言，过去对技术进展的预期已被现实超越：

    2022: Only capable of single-line code completion;

    2023: Capable of handling complete code snippets;

    2024: Expanded to cross-file collaboration, capable of building simple applications;

    2025: Already able to independently build and refactor complete codebases.

Duo Gen's recent statements on X also reflect her thoughts on the current state of the industry. She pointed out that the complexity and process friction in the software industry are constantly rising, making it difficult for developers to "just get things done," and the controversy surrounding coding agents is merely a symptom of structural issues in the industry. 多根近期在 X 上的发言也反映出她对行业现状的思考。她指出，软件行业复杂度与流程摩擦不断上升，开发者难以「直接把事情做成」，而围绕编码智能体的争议只是行业结构性问题的表象。

item.title: iQOO 15 Ultra 官宣将于「春节前」发布
item.guid: iQOO-15-Ultra-官宣将于「春节前」发布
item.description:
Yesterday, iQOO Mobile officially released a warm-up poster, announcing that the new iQOO 15 Ultra phone will be launched before the Spring Festival, positioned as 'Performance Ultra,' with core upgrades focusing on key configurations such as heat dissipation, control, and imaging. Online leaks indicate: 昨天，iQOO 手机官方发布预热海报，官宣 iQOO 15 Ultra 新机将在春节前发布，定位为「性能 Ultra」，核心升级集中在散热、操控与影像等关键配置上。网传爆料显示：

item.title: 首款「语音转艺术」智能画布将亮相 CES 2026
item.guid: 首款「语音转艺术」智能画布将亮相-CES-2026
item.description:
According to The Verge, Fraimic will publicly debut its "market's first voice-to-art" smart canvas, the Fraimic Smart Canvas, at CES 2026 this year. 据 The Verge 报道，Fraimic 将在今年 CES 2026 上首次公开展示其号称「市场首款语音转艺术」的智能画布 Fraimic Smart Canvas。

It is reported that the Fraimic Smart Canvas uses a full-color Spectra 6 e-ink screen, featuring a paper-like matte look, glare-free display, and achieves multi-year battery life because it only consumes power when 'changing art'. 据悉，Fraimic Smart Canvas 采用全彩 Spectra 6 电子墨水屏，主打类纸质哑光观感、无眩光显示，并因仅在「换画」时耗电，可实现多年级别的电池续航。

Users simply touch the mat on the edge of the frame and describe the desired image, and the system can generate AI artwork within seconds. Fraimic emphasizes that the device requires no app, no subscription, no cloud dependency, and can run privately locally; users can also upload images by accessing a local webpage via their phone, without needing to install additional applications. 用户只需轻触画框边缘垫子并描述想看到的画面，系统即可在数秒内生成 AI 艺术作品。Fraimic 强调设备无需 App、无需订阅、不依赖云端，可在本地私密运行；用户也可通过手机访问本地网页上传图片，无需安装额外应用。

Fraimic states that the product's core philosophy is "hardware-centric," viewing it as a long-term art display medium rather than an AI-driven digital device. Its design has won multiple international awards, including the BIG SEE Product Design Award 2026. Fraimic 表示，该产品的核心理念是「以硬件为中心」，将其视为可长期使用的艺术展示载体，而非以 AI 为主导的数码设备。其设计获得 BIG SEE Product Design Award 2026 等多项国际奖项。

The product will be available in two sizes: 产品将提供两种尺寸：

    Standard version 13.3 inches (fits 14×18×2 inch picture frames)

    Large version 31.5 inches (fits 24×36×2 inch picture frames)

Supports wall mounting or shelf placement, both with a cord-free design. Pre-order prices are $399 and $999 respectively. The Kickstarter crowdfunding platform is expected to ship in May this year, and direct sales channels for consumers are expected to launch in June this year. 支持上墙或搁架摆放，均为无电源线设计。预购价格分别为 399 美元与 999 美元，众筹平台 Kickstarter 预计今年 5 月发货，面向消费者的直销渠道预计今年 6 月启动。

Fraimic completed pre-production prototypes last year and raised over $1 million on Kickstarter. It is currently collaborating with Sungale Electronics to advance mass production preparations, including testing, verification, and compliance processes. Fraimic 去年完成预生产样机，并在 Kickstarter 上筹集超过 100 万美元，目前正与 Sungale Electronics 合作推进量产准备，包括测试、验证与合规流程。

item.title: 「灵魂计算机」Pickle 1 被指虚假宣传
item.guid: 「灵魂计算机」Pickle-1-被指虚假宣传
item.description:
Recently, startup Pickle released its first AR glasses product, Pickle 1, claiming it to be "the first soul computer," and opened initial pre-orders, attracting over 5 million views. 近日，初创公司 Pickle 发布其首款 AR 眼镜产品 Pickle 1，宣称这是「第一个灵魂计算机」，并开启首批预订，引发超过 500 万次围观。

After the launch video went online, tech figures like Robert Scoble also expressed support on social platforms. However, strong doubts quickly emerged within the industry regarding the product's technical authenticity and mass production feasibility. 发布视频上线后，科技圈人士如 Robert Scoble 也在社交平台表达支持。不过，围绕这款产品的技术真实性与量产可行性，业内很快出现强烈质疑。

Pickle claims on its official website that Pickle 1 features "the world's widest field-of-view binocular full-color AR display," a waveguide optical system clearly visible in strong light, a dual-battery design with 12-hour endurance, and achieves all-day wearability with a weight of 68 grams. Pickle 在官网宣称，Pickle 1 具备「全球最广视场角的双目全彩 AR 显示」、可在强光下清晰可见的波导光学系统、12 小时续航的双电池设计，并以 68 克重量实现全天候佩戴。

Furthermore, Pickle OS is described as an operating system "based on human memory structure," capable of real-time understanding of user environments, generating suggestions, recording memories, and providing virtual avatars with real-time expression and lip-sync synchronization. 此外，Pickle OS 被描述为「基于人类记忆结构」的操作系统，能够实时理解用户环境、生成建议、记录记忆，并提供具备实时表情与口型同步的虚拟化身。

However, Matthew Dowd, founder of VR company Wild, yesterday published a lengthy article on the X platform titled "Pickle Expose: Sliced and Diced," dissecting Pickle's technical claims point by point and accusing it of false advertising. 然而，VR 公司 Wild 创始人 Matthew Dowd 昨天在 X 平台发布长文《Pickle Expose: Sliced and Diced》，逐条拆解 Pickle 的技术主张，指控其存在虚假宣传。

Dowd stated that multiple capabilities demonstrated by Pickle 1 in its launch video — including 6DoF spatial tracking, real-time occlusion, hand tracking, wide field-of-view waveguide display, strong light visibility, zero-latency interaction, and real-time virtual avatar rendering — all far exceed the current hardware and software levels achievable in the AR industry. Dowd 表示，Pickle 1 在发布视频中展示的多项能力 —— 包括 6DoF 空间追踪、实时遮挡、手部追踪、宽视场角波导显示、强光可视、零延迟交互、实时虚拟形象渲染等，均远超当前 AR 行业可实现的硬件与软件水平。

Dowd pointed out that Pickle's claimed binocular full-color waveguide display is still a highly challenging technology in the industry. Existing manufacturers like Meta's Display Glasses only achieve monocular display, and are costly with limited battery life. Dowd 指出，Pickle 所宣称的双目全彩波导显示在行业内仍属高难度技术，现有厂商如 Meta 的 Display Glasses 仅实现单目显示，且成本高昂、续航有限。

He believes that Pickle 1's form factor and weight are insufficient to accommodate its claimed optical, heat dissipation, battery, and computing modules, and that the visuals shown in the video are more likely post-rendered rather than actual footage. 他认为 Pickle 1 的外形尺寸与重量不足以容纳其宣称的光学、散热、电池与计算模块，视频中展示的画面更像是后期渲染，而非真实拍摄。

He also reviewed relevant background information, pointing out that Pickle has undergone multiple transformations in the past year, from AI Zoom virtual avatars to desktop assistant Glass, and then to Whisper by Pickle, none of which were related to AR hardware, and it had previously been accused of plagiarizing open-source projects. 他还梳理相关背景信息指出，Pickle 在过去一年内多次转型，从 AI Zoom 虚拟替身，到桌面助手 Glass，再到 Whisper by Pickle，均与 AR 硬件无关，且曾被指控抄袭开源项目。

He believes that the Pickle team lacks any AR / VR related experience, making it impossible to complete such complex hardware R&D in a short period. 他认为 Pickle 团队缺乏任何 AR / VR 相关经验，不可能在短时间内完成如此复杂的硬件研发。

At the end of the article, Dowd issued a public wager to Pickle CEO Daniel Park: if Pickle can deliver Pickle 1 to US users by the second quarter of next year according to the specifications described on its official website, he will pay Pickle all pre-order revenue; if it cannot deliver, then Park will pay him the equivalent amount. 文章最后，Dowd 向 Pickle CEO Daniel Park 发出公开赌约：若 Pickle 能在明年第二季度按官网所述规格向美国用户交付 Pickle 1，他将支付 Pickle 全部预订收入；若无法交付，则由 Park 向他支付同等金额。

Currently, Pickle has not publicly responded to Dowd's accusations. 目前，Pickle 尚未对 Dowd 的指控作出公开回应。

item.title: 星巴克开启新年巧克力季，多款新品亮相
item.guid: 星巴克开启新年巧克力季，多款新品亮相
item.description:
Recently, Starbucks' New Year Treasure Chocolate Season officially kicked off, with the brand introducing several new chocolate beverages and themed merchandise to create a more ceremonial consumer experience for the start of the year. 近日，星巴克新年宝藏巧克力季正式开启，品牌以多款全新巧克力饮品与主题商品，为今年的开端营造更具仪式感的消费体验。

In addition to beverages, Starbucks also launched two major themed merchandise series this year, "Galloping Star Journey" and "Instant Happiness," inspired by the ripe color of coffee cherries and the "seize the moment" attitude towards life, continuing the brand's design narrative for festive occasions. 除饮品外，星巴克今年同步推出「骏跃星程」与「马上快乐」两大主题商品系列，分别以咖啡果实成熟色泽与「把握当下」的生活态度为灵感，延续品牌在节庆节点的设计叙事。

The former uses orange and red to symbolize the process from start to harvest, incorporating elements such as galloping horses, cloud patterns, and copper coins; the latter conveys a relaxed and humorous emotional energy through the dynamic imagery of the character "马" (horse). 前者以橙色与红色象征从起步到丰收的过程，并加入骏马、云纹、铜钱等元素；后者则以「马」字的动态意象传递轻松幽默的情绪能量。

item.title: 联名火爆致系统崩溃，汉堡王一天两次道歉
item.guid: 联名火爆致系统崩溃，汉堡王一天两次道歉
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, yesterday, Burger King's online system experienced widespread failures due to a sudden surge in traffic caused by a brand ambassador event, leading to two public apologies within a single day. 据界面新闻报道，昨天，汉堡王因代言人活动引发的瞬时流量激增导致线上系统大面积故障，并在一天内两度公开致歉。

Burger King China stated that yesterday morning, its mini-program, app, and third-party entry points like Alipay experienced lag, crashes, and abnormal positioning, with the online ordering system completely halting at one point. 汉堡王中国表示，昨日上午其小程序、APP 及支付宝等第三方入口出现卡顿、闪退与定位异常，线上点餐系统一度完全停滞。

At 11:12 AM, the brand first posted, stating that due to a rapid surge in access volume within a short period, the system's capacity was insufficient. The team was urgently working on repairs and apologized for the poor user experience. 11 时 12 分，品牌首次发文称，由于访问量在短时间内急剧攀升，系统承载能力不足，团队正在紧急修复，并对用户的不佳体验致歉。

About an hour later, Burger King issued another apology statement, saying that some users were unable to successfully purchase the "2026 Brand Ambassador New Year's Day Gift Box Combo," and promised to open pre-orders for the same merchandise on its Tmall official flagship store, with specific times and rules to be announced separately. 约一小时后，汉堡王再次发布致歉声明，称部分用户未能成功购买「2026 代言人元旦礼盒套餐」，并承诺将在天猫官方旗舰店开放同款周边的预订，具体时间与规则将另行公布。

According to a staff member at a Beijing Xicheng District store, as cited by China-Singapore Jingwei, offline ordering services, excluding the co-branded combo, were normal, and customers could place orders directly at the store. The staff member stated that the system crash was primarily due to the excessive popularity of the co-branded merchandise combo, which led to a concentrated influx of access requests and paralyzed the online system. 据中新经纬援引北京西城区门店工作人员消息，线下除联名套餐外的点餐服务正常，顾客可直接到店下单。工作人员称，此次系统崩溃主要因联名周边套餐热度过高，访问量集中涌入导致线上系统瘫痪。

Public information shows that Burger King announced Tian Xuning as its brand ambassador on December 30th this year and launched a co-branded gift box, limited to 60,000 units nationwide and priced at 69.9 yuan. 公开信息显示，汉堡王于今年 12 月 30 日宣布田栩宁成为品牌代言人，并推出全国限量 6 万份、售价 69.9 元的联名礼盒。

Tian Xuning (real name Tian Lei) is a Chinese mainland film and television actor, who played major roles in works such as "Six Sisters," "Daydream and Her," and "Reversed Love" last year. 田栩宁（本名田雷）为中国内地影视演员，去年在《六姊妹》《白日梦与她》《逆爱》等作品中出演主要角色。

Additionally, Burger King's parent company, RBI Group, announced in November last year the establishment of a joint venture "Burger King China" with CPE Yuanfeng Capital, with the latter injecting $350 million for store expansion, marketing, menu innovation, and operational capability enhancement. 此外，汉堡王母公司 RBI 集团去年 11 月宣布与 CPE 源峰资本成立合资企业「汉堡王中国」，并由后者注入 3.5 亿美元，用于门店扩张、营销、菜单创新与运营能力提升。

item.title: 曝山姆中国付费会员破千万，线下零售会员规模创纪录
item.guid: 曝山姆中国付费会员破千万，线下零售会员规模创纪录
item.description:
Recently, "Business Observer" cited industry insiders reporting that Sam's Club China for the first time this year achieved a breakthrough of over ten million paid members, becoming one of the largest paid membership systems in China's offline retail sector, and demonstrating strong momentum in user spending power and growth resilience. 近日，《商业观察家》援引业内人士报道称，山姆中国在今年首次实现付费会员规模突破千万，成为中国线下零售领域体量最大的付费会员体系之一，并在用户消费力与增长韧性上展现出强劲势头。

The report shows that as of the end of this year, Sam's Club China's paid membership exceeded 10.7 million, with annual sales exceeding 140 billion yuan, all contributed by paid members. Based on this calculation, the average annual spending per paid member at Sam's Club China reached 13,000 yuan, setting a rare level in the domestic physical retail industry. 报道显示，截至今年年末，山姆中国付费会员数超过 1070 万，全年销售额超过 1400 亿元，全部由付费会员贡献。以此计算，山姆中国单个付费会员的年度平均消费金额达到 1.3 万元，创下国内实体零售行业的罕见水平。

The report points out that in the Chinese market, offline enterprises capable of forming a scaled paid membership system are extremely limited. Apart from Sam's Club and Costco, other retail enterprises have not yet established comparable paid membership systems. Hema's "Hema X Member Store," which was previously launched, exited the market this year. 报道指出，在中国市场，能够形成规模化付费会员体系的线下企业极为有限。除山姆与开市客外，其他零售企业尚未建立可对标的付费会员体系。盒马曾推出的「盒马 X 会员店」已于今年退出市场。

Compared to offline, Alibaba and JD.com have larger online paid membership scales. Alibaba's 88VIP reached 56 million in the third quarter of this year, and JD PLUS members have maintained a scale of approximately 34 million since the end of 2024. 相比线下，阿里与京东的线上付费会员规模更大。阿里 88VIP 在今年第三季度达到 5600 万，京东 PLUS 会员数自 2024 年末以来维持在约 3400 万规模。

In terms of absolute scale, Sam's Club China's paid membership is about one-third to one-fifth of the two platforms, but its offline model dictates a different growth path from online platforms. 从绝对规模看，山姆中国付费会员数约为两家平台的三分之一至五分之一，但其线下模式决定了增长路径与线上平台不同。

Market insiders point out that Sam's Club China's growth resilience comes from three aspects: a strict membership system, the scarcity of goods and services, and a high brand credibility in consumers' minds. 市场人士指出，山姆中国的增长韧性来自三方面：严格的会员制度、商品与服务的稀缺性，以及较高的品牌信用心智。

The report mentions that Sam's Club's rapid growth in China is partly due to online platforms educating young consumers about paid memberships, allowing Sam's Club to successfully acquire these users during their family consumption stage. 报道提到，山姆在中国的快速成长，部分得益于线上平台对年轻消费者进行的付费会员教育，使其在家庭消费阶段顺利承接这批用户。

Official data shows that Sam's Club currently has 63 stores nationwide, and Walmart China plans to achieve 200 billion yuan in annual sales by 2026, with Sam's Club business remaining one of its core growth engines. 官方数据显示，山姆会员商店目前在全国已开出 63 家门店，沃尔玛中国计划在 2026 年实现全年 2000 亿元销售额，其中山姆业务仍是核心增长引擎之一。

item.title: 多地消费者投诉洗脸熊「跑路」，创始人致歉并启动追责
item.guid: 多地消费者投诉洗脸熊「跑路」，创始人致歉并启动追责
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, the facial cleansing and care brand "Xilianxiong Xilianba" (Wash Face Bear Wash Bar) has recently been complained about by consumers in multiple regions regarding issues such as stores "absconding," inability to contact merchants, membership cards not being usable across stores, and difficulty in obtaining refunds, involving areas like Guangdong, Shanghai, and Zhejiang. 据界面新闻报道 ，面部清洁护理品牌「洗脸熊·洗脸吧」近日被多地消费者投诉称出现门店「跑路」、无法联系商家、会员卡无法跨店使用及退款困难等问题，涉及广东、上海、浙江等多地。

Tang Huabo, founder of Xilianxiong, told Nandu Bay Finance that he deeply regretted the company's inadequate oversight and stated that he would earnestly protect consumer rights. 洗脸熊创始人唐华波向南都 · 湾财社表示，对公司监管不到位深感自责，并称将切实维护消费者权益。

Xilianxiong subsequently issued a statement saying that, upon verification, this incident involved "individual stores" unilaterally suspending operations without full communication with the headquarters and in violation of cooperation agreements. The headquarters has initiated legal accountability procedures based on the cooperation agreement and relevant laws and regulations, and will urge the involved stores to complete refunds and subsequent processing. 洗脸熊随后发布声明称，经核查，本次事件涉及的为「个别门店」在未与总部充分沟通、违反合作协议的情况下擅自停业，总部已依据合作协议及相关法律法规启动法律追责程序，并将督促涉事门店完成退款及后续处理。

Xilianxiong emphasized that its more than 2,600 stores nationwide are currently operating normally, and services have not been affected. 洗脸熊强调，其全国超过 2600 家门店目前均正常运营，服务未受影响。

According to information on the brand's official website, Xilianxiong is a subsidiary of Guangdong Aimeixiong Beauty Technology Co., Ltd., established in September 2021. It focuses on facial cleansing and care, primarily targeting consumers born in the 80s, 90s, and 00s. The brand claims to have over 3,300 cooperative stores globally and plans to expand to 10,000 stores in the future. 品牌官网信息显示，洗脸熊隶属于广东爱美熊美容科技有限公司，成立于 2021 年 9 月，定位面部清洁护理，主要面向 80/90/00 消费群体。该品牌宣称全球合作门店超过 3300 家，并计划未来扩张至 10000 家。

Data from third-party platforms shows that Xilianxiong's individual project prices range from 50 to 233 yuan, including small bubble blackhead cleansing (51 yuan), deep cleansing and hydration (173 yuan), firming and anti-wrinkle (233 yuan after discount), and a 2000 yuan stored-value card project. 第三方平台数据显示，洗脸熊单个项目价格区间为 50–233 元，包括小气泡清洁黑头（51 元）、深层清洁加补水（173 元）、紧致抗皱（折后 233 元）等，另有 2000 元储值卡项目。

According to Qichacha information, Guangdong Aimeixiong Beauty Technology Co., Ltd. is 99% owned by Guangzhou Zhongyanyuese Network Technology Partnership (Limited Partnership) and 1% owned by Tang Huabo. Tang Huabo has 10 affiliated enterprises under his name, 8 of which are in operation or active status. 企查查信息显示，广东爱美熊美容科技有限公司由广州众颜悦色网络科技合伙企业（有限合伙）持股 99%，唐华波持股 1%，其名下共有 10 家关联企业，其中 8 家处于存续或开业状态。

item.title: 《寻秦记》票房破亿
item.guid: 《寻秦记》票房破亿
item.description:
Recently, the main creators of the movie "A Step into the Past" held a roadshow event in Foshan, Guangdong. Since its release, the film's box office has exceeded 100 million yuan, becoming a highlight of this year's New Year's Eve slot. Louis Koo, Raymond Lam, Jessica Hsuan, and Chu Kin-yan attended, interacting closely with fans who had waited for many years. 日前，《寻秦记》电影主创在广东佛山举行路演活动，影片自上映以来票房已突破 1 亿元，成为今年跨年档的亮眼作品。古天乐、林峯、宣萱与朱鉴然到场，与等待多年的影迷近距离交流。

Louis Koo expressed his gratitude to the audience, and when a fan shouted, "If the box office breaks 300 million tomorrow, hold a concert," he humorously responded, "If the box office breaks 300 million before tonight, I'll sing 'Trendy Now'," which drew cheers from the entire venue. 古天乐向观众表达感谢，并在粉丝喊话「如果明天票房破三亿开演唱会」时，以「如果今晚之前票房破三亿就唱《今期流行》」幽默回应，引发全场欢呼。

The roadshow attracted audiences from various parts of the country. Many viewers had watched the TV series version of "A Step into the Past" since childhood and now brought their families to the cinema again, creating an emotional continuation spanning two decades. 路演现场吸引了来自全国多地的观众，不少观众从小观看电视剧版《寻秦记》，如今携家人再次走进影院，形成跨越二十年的情感延续。

item.title: 《偷偷藏不住》定档暑期上映
item.guid: 《偷偷藏不住》定档暑期上映
item.description:
Yesterday, the youth romance film "Hidden Love" officially announced that it will be released in cinemas nationwide next summer. The film also released its theme song "Can't Hide," performed by singer Yan Renzhong. 昨天，青春爱情电影《偷偷藏不住》正式官宣将于明年暑期登陆全国院线。影片同步公布主题曲《藏不住》，由歌手颜人中演唱。

The film is adapted from the eponymous phenomenal novel, which ranked Top 2 on Jinjiang Literature City's overall score list. The original work has accumulated over 50 billion topic views across the entire network. 影片改编自晋江文学城总分榜 Top2 的同名现象级小说，原著在全网累计话题阅读量超过 500 亿。

The film's story revolves around Sang Zhi's innocent crush on her brother's roommate, Duan Jiaxu. After many years, the two reunite in a new time and space, with their feelings evolving from a subtle undercurrent to a passionate pursuit. The filmmakers emphasize that the natural temperament of the new actors highly aligns with the characters' growth arc, which will provide audiences with a more immersive cinematic experience. 电影故事围绕桑稚对哥哥室友段嘉许的青涩暗恋展开，跨越多年后，两人在全新时空重逢，情感从暗涌走向奔赴。片方强调，新人演员的自然气质与角色成长线高度契合，将为观众带来更具代入感的银幕体验。

item.title: 《翠湖》定档 1 月 24 日
item.guid: 《翠湖》定档-1-月-24-日
item.description:
Recently, "Cuihu" officially announced its release date for January 24th, simultaneously unveiling its release poster and trailer. 近日，《翠湖》正式宣布定档 1 月 24 日，并同步释出定档海报及预告。

The film, directed by Bian Zhuo, won Best Film in the "Asian New Talent Unit" at the 27th Shanghai International Film Festival. It tells the story of a widowed elderly man living by Kunming's Cuihu Lake who tries to restart his life after the pain of losing his wife, but faces strong opposition from his daughters. 影片由卞灼执导，曾获第 27 届上海国际电影节「亚洲新人单元」最佳影片，讲述一位居住在昆明翠湖畔的丧偶老人，在经历丧妻之痛后尝试重启生活，却遭遇女儿们的强烈反对。

The ensuing family conflicts make him realize his long-standing absence in family relationships. As he attempts to return as a patriarch, he must confront the long-accumulated regrets and silent emotional tug-of-war among three generations. 由此引发的家庭冲突，使他意识到自己长期在家庭关系中的缺位，并在试图重新以家长身份回归时，不得不面对三代人之间累积已久的遗憾与无声的情感拉扯。
